label: 平治物語
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Heiji monogatari (J.) 平治物語, also referred to as 平治記 Heijiki. This anonymous military tale depicts the events of the Heiji conflict (1159), which witnessed the victory of Taira no Kiyomori (1118-81) over 源義朝 Minamoto no Yoshitomo (1123-60).
